name: Can Smash?
description:
Can Smash has finally reached your iPhone and iPad.
It’s time to relax.
In Can Smash you can smash everything that you can't smash in your life，such as phone, TV, and camera.

【Gameplay】
- Tap the screen, smash the world.
- 11 kinds of HELPER.
- Collect coins, unlock high level.
- Idle but not idle.
- Huge reward waiting for you.
【Feature】
- Free to play
- One touch gameplay
- All kind of stages wait you play
- The high level you upgrade, the more things you got
